location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to The Mutesellin of Bussorah [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right corner of the page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from insect damage and is difficult to read in places as parts of the text are missing.

mods.abstract: The letter expresses regret that the sender had reason to complain about the conduct of a person in the service of the British Government. It states that Captain Taylor will doubtless conduct an impartial investigation into any irregularities on his return to Bussorah [Basra].
